definition: original (of a document)/reserved copy (of a library book)
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: The original articles of association must be marked with the certification of entry in the register and be returned.
sentences.chinese: 章程的正本必須附記登記證明，並予發還。

sentences.english: The original of The Corporate Business License should be laid up in an eye-catching place of the company's residence.
sentences.chinese: 營業執照正本應放在企業法人住所醒目的位置。

sentences.english: The buyer should pay total amount to seller by T/T within 10 days after receipt of the concerning original B/L.
sentences.chinese: 買方應在收到正本提單後10天內電匯支付全部貨款。

sentences.english: Do you want to learn authentic Chinese medicine in native China?
sentences.chinese: 你想學到正本清源的中醫嗎？

sentences.english: Photocopies of the Original Tender minimise the risk of discrepancies.
sentences.chinese: 標書正本影印件能最大限度地減少差異的機率。

sentences.english: Please post the original order form with a crossed cheque to the council.
sentences.chinese: 請再將已傳真之表格正本連同劃線支票郵寄至本協會。

sentences.english: One original of "Non-Wooden Packing Certificate" issued by the manufacturer.
sentences.chinese: 生產商出具的“非木質包裝證書”正本一份。

sentences.english: This Agreement is made in duplicate, one original for each party hereto.
sentences.chinese: 本協議一式二份，各方圴持有一份正本。

sentences.english: Each air waybill has three originals and at least 6 copies.
sentences.chinese: 每份空運運單有三份正本以及至少六份副本。

sentences.english: It is common practice to make a back-up file for our documents.
sentences.chinese: 慣常做法是爲正本另立一個後備檔案。

sentences.english: The applicant should provide the original and a photocopy of all documentary evidence for checking.
sentences.chinese: 申請人必須提供所有有關證明文件正本及副本供查覈。

sentences.english: H. one original equipment acceptance certificate signed and affixed by the end-user and the seller.
sentences.chinese: 由最終使用者和賣方簽章的設備驗收證書正本一份。

sentences.english: Please mail the original bank-in slip and this form to the SPCA Fund-raising Department.
sentences.chinese: 請將入數紙正本及此表格寄回本會籌款部。

sentences.english: To avoid loss or damage, the original copy of quality system documents shall not be borrowed out.
sentences.chinese: 質量體系文件正本一律不外借，以防丟失或損環。

sentences.english: We arranged Telex Release, as a result, we had no Original B/L.
sentences.chinese: 由於我們是安排電放，所以我們沒有正本提單。

sentences.english: Present the original and the photocopy of any supporting document when submitting the application form.
sentences.chinese: 遞交申請表時請出示有關證明文件之正本及影印本。

definition: copy (of a document)/book with model calligraphy for copying
to affix a seal/to stamp (a document)/to sign off on sth
receipt (written acknowledgement of receipt of an item)
to receive for storage/delivery of goods/to gather and store/to store safely/safe keeping
